tool.name: Intersect Tabular Files
tool.description: based on a shared column (Inner Join)
tool.help:
Given two files, file A::
0ca428d3,Alice,32,Austin 895f2882,Bob,18,Houston b64994a8,Carol,94,College Station
and a file B::
Alice,Wakeboarding Alice,Skiing Carol,Knitting
You might be interested in finding the intersection of these two files. For these inputs and selecting column 2 from file A and column 1 from file B, you would get the following output:
0ca428d3,Alice,32,Austin,Alice,Wakeboarding 0ca428d3,Alice,32,Austin,Alice,Skiing b64994a8,Carol,94,College Station,Carol,Knitting
